content.query:
----------------------------------
--- CREATE EXTERNAL TABLES ---
-----------------------------------
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE revenue_external_table

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE revenue_external_table
(
    Dealer_ID  VARCHAR(4000),
    Model_ID   VARCHAR(4000),
    Branch_ID  VARCHAR(4000),
    Date_ID    VARCHAR(4000),
    Units_Sold VARCHAR(4000),
    Revenue    VARCHAR(4000)
)
WITH
(
    LOCATION = 'revenue',
    DATA_SOURCE = raw_external_source,
    FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_type2
)

SELECT * from revenue_external_table1
